Options.GROUP[SimpleModChecker.SimpleMod: Currently Supported Mods for Mod Settings Backup
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[SimpleModChec: Enable or disable the Main Menu notification.
Enable or disable playing a small audio sound on mods loading completed.
Options.OPTION[SimpleModChecker.SimpleMo: Auto delete Mods with Missing CIDs?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[SimpleModChec: Enable or disable the automatic deletion of mods with missing CIDs. These mods will be automatically redownloaded with the CIDs next time by Skyve or the game on next start.
Enable or disable the automatic deletion of corrupted settings (game or mod).
Enable or disable the automatic restoring of all game settings, supported mods settings and all keybinds from Profile 1 when the game starts.
Enable or disable detailed logging to catch issues (only to be used for debugging purpose).
Rename Profile 1.
Rename Profile 2.
Rename Profile 3.

Rename Profile 5.
Rename Profile 6.
Rename Profile 7.

Rename Profile 9.
Save Profile Names after typing the entries.

Select the profile to be used for the buttons below. Profile 1 will be auto restored on launch if the "Auto Restore Settings on Startup (Profile 1)?" is active.
The profile names can be changed from the "Profile Names" tab after toggling "<[Show Advanced]>".
Backup Game Settings to the selected profile.
Restore Game Settings from the selected profile.
Backup Mod Settings to the selected profile.
Restore Mod Settings from the selected profile.
Backup Keybinds to the selected profile.
Restore Keybinds from the selected profile.

Verify all mods downloaded from PDX Mods and currently stored on disk.
The process will take some time depending on the number and size of the mods.
- Please do not run this while in game/editor.
- Pleased do not launch game/editor while the verification is running.
The time when the current mod database was published.
Support the author.
Feedback/Suggestions for the mod in the Cities: Skylines Modding Server.
Options.OPTION[SimpleModChecker.SimpleMo:
This mod offers utility features for managing mods and various settings in Cities: Skylines II:
Feautures
- Mod Loaded Notification: Get a main menu notifications on startup which shows how many mod is loaded in this session. A list of assemblies can be found on the Mod List tab.
- Auto Delete Mods with Missing CIDs: Automatically remove asset/map packages with missing Content IDs.
- Auto Delete Corrupted Settings: In an event when the game crashes without improper disposing, the settings files for various mods or the game itself can get corrupted. Automatically delete those corrupted settings files.
- Backup/Restore Settings: Manually backup and restore vanilla game settings and mod settings separately in 9 profiles.
- Auto Restore Settings on Startup (Profile 1): Automatically restore vanilla game settings and supported mod settings from Profile 1 on startup after accidental resets.
- [NEW] Backup/restore keybinds from vanilla game or any mods!
- [NEW] Mod verification.
